mapper.select: select * FROM t_federated_exchange order by update_time desc limit #{startIndex}, #{exchangePageQo.pageSize})

select count(1) FROM t_federated_exchange a, t_roll_site b, t_party c where a.exchange_id = b.exchange_id and b.roll_site_id = c.roll_site_id and c.party_id in (select party_id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions=#{institutions}) group by exchangeName

select a.* FROM t_federated_exchange a, t_roll_site b, t_party c where a.exchange_id = b.exchange_id and b.roll_site_id = c.roll_site_id and c.party_id in (select party_id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions=#{exchangePageForFateManagerQo.institutions}) group by exchangeName order by update_time desc limit #{startIndex}, #{exchangePageForFateManagerQo.pageSize})
